subject: Doping (Sports)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: The Spanish cyclist Alejandro Valverde received a global two-year ban for his connection to a blood-doping ring, but he was allowed to keep his victory in the 2009 Vuelta a España.
snippet: The Spanish cyclist Alejandro Valverde received a global two-year ban for his connection to a blood-doping ring, but he was allowed to keep his victory in the 2009 Vuelta a España.
